messages.subject: Cowboy Bob's finally updated his site. Made some offerings to the Ebay Gods as well.
messages.msgSnippet: Guys & Gals, I ve finally got off my ass and updated my website, I ve also listed 4 books for sale on Ebay. I ve been sitting on most of these books for a few
messages.messageBody:
Guys & Gals,

I've finally got off my ass and updated my website,
I've also listed 4 books for sale on Ebay. I've been
sitting on most of these books for a few months now
and they have to go in order for me to get some new
ones. Also the Dai Token Ichi is right around the
corner and it's about time I purchased my first blade
and for that I need some cash so enjoy and please bid
them up. These Auctions do not start until Monday the
25th in order to give me some time to add more
offerings.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3545349699


http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3545351968


http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3545359627


http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3545360096


Bob R

=====
